meta.content:
IMPORTANT UPDATE: Guidance to Schools on COVID-19 ENROLL IN SUMMER SCHOOL NOW
Preparing Students For A
Successful Future e-Institute is a FREE charter school that offers an excellent alternative opportunity for high school completion with flexible schedules.
ENROLL TODAY

div.h1: Arizona West Valley’s Premier Charter High School

div.class: fusion-fullwidth fullwidth-box fusion-builder-row-4 nonhundred-percent-fullwidth non-hundred-percent-height-scrolling fusion-equal-height-columns

fusion-layout-column fusion_builder_column fusion_builder_column_3_5 fusion-builder-column-7 fusion-three-fifth fusion-column-last 3_5

div.h2: Education Is The Most Powerful Weapon
div.p: e-Institute is a FREE charter school that offers an excellent alternative opportunity for high school completion. Our computer based programs are aligned with the Arizona State Standards and offer the latest in educational assessment, guided practice, enhancement and remedial course studies. In addition, we also offer classes in the traditional setting such as; AIMS reading, writing, and math prep courses.

As a premier charter high school in Phoenix, Arizona’s west valley we place the highest importance on the quality of our education. Our well-rounded curriculum includes a wide selection of required high school courses and electives. Our highly qualified teachers share the same passion with us, which is to help students realize their goals and prepare better for the future. More importantly, the entire e-Institute community values the fact that each student has his or her own learning style and needs, hence the self-paced learning setting.

We provide a self-pace setting that’s ideal for students who want to speed up their graduation date or catch up on credits. Our flexible schedule makes it convenient for those students who have jobs or other responsibilities. We have two-four hour sessions five days a week.

We are also one of the only few charter schools in the west valley that offer special education. We ensure quality education for children with disability by giving them a holistic curriculum while attending to their unique needs.

Whether you want to earn extra credits, catch up on missed classes, or go back to high school without entering traditional school, e-Institute is the right place for you. We offer a learning experience different — but equally meaningful — from what you used to have in a regular public high school.
e-Institute believes in the power of education to change lives. Thus, we do everything to make high school education accessible to many. Get in touch with us today to know more.

e-Institute is committed to our students, staff, teachers and the importance of the quality of our education. In accordance with A.R.S. §15-189.05, as added by Laws 2018, Ch. 285, §3, a school’s budget shall include the prominent display of the average salary of all teachers employed by the school for the budget and prior years, and the increase in the average salary of all teachers employed by the school for the budget year reported in dollars and percentage. Schools must also prominently post this information on their website home page separately from its budget.
